sm::eod::io::TcpClient

TcpClient Class Reference

#include <tcpclient.h>

Inherits TcpEndPoint.

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A simple TCP stream.

Typical usage: 

                TcpClient client;
                client.open(InetAddress(HTTP_PORT, WEB_SITE_URL));
                std::vector<uint8> data;
                client.send(data);
                client.receive(data);
                client.close();
